title: Microsoft is confident Windows on Arm could finally beat Apple
contents: Sources familiar with Microsoft’s plans tell The Verge that Microsoft is confident that a round of new Arm-powered Windows laptops will beat Apple’s M3-powered MacBook Air both in CPU performance and AI-accelerated tasks.

title: Sending an Email in 1984 Required You to Connect a Phone Line to a Modem
contents: Long before broadband internet, IBM PCs running DOS could link with FidoNet for email and shared bulletin board posting. Sending an email in 1984 required one to connect a phone line to a modem.

title: Nikon’s MRMC Unveils Cinebot MAX, a Robot Capable of Holding a 44-Pound Camera
contents: Nikon’s MRMC unveils Cinebot MAX, a robot designed for industry professionals capable of holding a 44-pound camera, while supporting a maximum height of 10.5-feet and a reach of 5.7-feet.
